applicant-name.name: WUHAN QICHUANG SEMICONDUCTOR MAT CO LTD
武汉启创半导体材料有限责任公司

invention-title: Environment-friendly preparation process of bis (diethylamino) silane
一种双(二乙基氨基)硅烷的环保制备工艺

abstract.p: The invention relates to the technical field of chemical synthesis, in particular to an environment-friendly preparation process of bis (diethylamino) silane. The invention relates to an environment-friendly preparation process of bis (diethylamino) silane. The environment-friendly preparation process comprises the following steps: preparing an activated carbon adsorbent; mixing of diethylamine and hexane and adsorption of volatile matters; absolute ethyl alcohol is used for removing a byproduct hydrogen chloride and enhancing a reaction system. According to the preparation method, absolute ethyl alcohol is added into a mixed solvent of diethylamine and hexane, when dichlorosilane is added into the mixed solvent, dichlorosilane and diethylamine react in a low-temperature protective atmosphere to generate bis (diethylamino) silane and a byproduct hydrogen chloride, and hydrogen chloride is absorbed by absolute ethyl alcohol, so that the hydrogen chloride is prevented from overflowing in a gas form; and the collected nitrogen is polluted, and the forward proceeding of the reaction system can be enhanced, so that the preparation process is more environment-friendly, and the reaction yield of the target product bis (diethylamino) silane can be improved to a certain extent.

本发明涉及化工合成技术领域，具体地说是一种双(二乙基氨基)硅烷的环保制备工艺。一种双(二乙基氨基)硅烷的环保制备工艺，包括以下步骤：制备活性炭吸附剂；二乙胺和己烷的混合与挥发物的吸附；无水乙醇除去副产物氯化氢及增强反应体系。本发明通过将无水乙醇加入二乙胺和己烷的混合溶剂中，当二氯硅烷加入混合溶剂中时，二氯硅烷与二乙胺在低温保护性气氛下反应生成双(二乙基氨基)硅烷和副产物氯化氢，氯化氢被无水乙醇吸收，既防止了氯化氢以气体形式溢出，污染收集的氮气，又能加强反应体系的正向进行，使制备工艺更加环保，且能一定程度提高目标产物双(二乙基氨基)硅烷反应收率。
